extendedInfo.description: Challenge your friends now and try to beat their scores. A great and addictive connecting the dots game you will love - try it and you will see: you won't be able to stop playing! Now with Google Play Games integration (with Leaderboards and Achievements)! What is this thrilling game about? Connect all numbers (starting with #1) on the screen but beware: don't forget to cover all squares! Be as efficient as possible and try to reduce your number of moves. They will all be counted and used for your Google Play Games achievements. In total, 1296 puzzles out of 6 categories are ready to be solved. But don't worry - they come in different sizes, from 4x4 to 9x9 squares, so you can start easy and increase the difficulty as you progress. There is even a whole category especially for kids! You can use hints when you're stuck - you need stars to get these hints. With our star system, you can easily get hints by using stars. Stars are important when you want to unlock more levels as well. You ear these stars by solving levels perfectly!Features of Space Dots - Brain Puzzle Game (free): - Connect the Dots one after another- Over 1200 different puzzles with different difficulties- 6 different puzzle categories (different game boards)- Changeable game modes: Play it with numbers or letters - it can be changed at any time - Hints: Use them to solve the puzzle when you're stuck (and use our star system)- Great sound effects and music (can be turned on/off separately)- Challenging and addictive gameplay- Use of a star system (earn them while playing and use them to get hints, remove advertisements and unlock more levels)- Colorful UI- Great brain training puzzle (create a flow and connect all numbers)- Google Play Games integration: Challenge your friends (Leaderboards and Achievements)- Time Attack mode (solve as many puzzles as you can in a given time)Google Play Games integration: Challenge your friends! - ... and try your best to unlock all 26 different achievements - ... or reach for the top in one of 6 leaderboards Start connecting them all now! It's a perfect app for you when you like logic and strategic puzzles like Flow, Flow Bridges, Branch, Pipes, Connect the Dots, Dots, Dot to Dot games and other brain trainer apps.If you enjoy playing our app, please take a minute to rate and review it. Please consider that we cannot reply to your comments in the Appstore. If you have any questions or need our help, please send us an e-mail to support+android@coragames.com or contact us by using the given support link. Please inform us when you find an error or bug instead of giving us a one star rating. We will do our best to fix the problem as soon as possible. Your help is much appreciated. Thank you! Have fun with Space Dots Extreme - a great Flow and Connect all Dots app for adults and kids!  Try it now, it's free!

reviews.title: Addicted
reviews.comment: Fun game I play at work to pass the time by!!!!
reviews.author: Dennis Kriegler
